box_size.name: Box size
box_size.description: Provide the size of the bounding box in XYZ

camera_defaults.name: Camera defaults
camera_defaults.description: Provide the default view of the 3D scene

scale_factor.name: Scale factor
scale_factor.help: Please use only digits and decimals with no commas
scale_factor.description: Provide a multiplier for 3D coordinates if the visualization is too large or too small

trajectory_title.name: Trajectory title
trajectory_title.help: Please use only uppercase and lowercase letters and digits
trajectory_title.description: Provide a title for this trajectory, possibly describing parameters

model_meta_data.name: Model metadata
model_meta_data.description: provide metadata for the model that was used to calculate this trajectory
